#include <stdio.h>


int main(void){


  int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  
  while(t--){
    unsigned long long n,q;
    
    scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&q);
    unsigned long long bookings[5000][2] = {0};
    unsigned long long start,end;
    for(unsigned long long i=0; i<n; i++){
      scanf("%llu %llu",&start,&end);
      bookings[i][0] = start;
      bookings[i][1] = end;
    }
    for(unsigned long long i=0; i<q; i++){
      scanf("%llu",&start);
      int available = 1;
      for(unsigned long long j=0; j<n; j++){
	if( (start >= bookings[j][0]) && (start <= bookings[j][1])){
	  printf("NO\n");
	  available = 0;
	  break;
	}
      }
      if(available)
	printf("YES\n");
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
